abstract: Wall Street indexes climbed higher on Wednesday amid new evidence that the United States economy could be staging a recovery, The New York Times reported.
snippet: Wall Street indexes climbed higher on Wednesday amid new evidence that the United States economy could be staging a recovery, The New York Times reported.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street indexes climbed higher on Wednesday amid new evidence that the United States economy could be staging a recovery, The New York Times’s Christine Hauser reported.

headline.main: Gold Jumps as Wall Street Steadily Rises
